alert.note: Alert for Umatilla (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 29 at 1:36PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR A DAM FLOODGATE RELEASE IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 PM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by upstream dam release release is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northeast Oregon, including the following county, Umatilla. * WHEN...Until 130 PM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of low lying areas along McKay Creek downstream of the dam is expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 128 PM PDT, An upstream floodgate release is expected to cause flooding along McKay Creek. Two to three inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Pendleton. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
